tag_professor: Participation matters (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Hilarious (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Professor Liang is a nice woman. In order to well in her class, you must attend regularly, complete the homework, and do the practice problems she gives you, and the ones in the text book. If you do all of that, you should receive a good grade. She will offer some extra credit. Class participation will also help you out, so participate.

comments: She\'s the best if you want to major in accounting. she makes things so clear.:)

comments: Awesome professor. Speaks broken English but not too hard to understand. Class is mad easy, quizzes are 2 multiple choice, you get a cheat sheet for tests. Show up and participate and you will get an A.

tag_professor: Participation matters (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Hilarious (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Professor Liang is super nice.She give out candy frequently.Her teaching is clear. The test is fairly easy.The best part is she allows cheat sheet on your test. Believe me, it is important for acc class

tag_professor: Participation matters (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Hilarious (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Nice handouts, mandatory attendance. she gives grades unfairly like gave an A- for an average in 93, and she gave an A to somebody average in 91. if you take her class, you\'d better have a good relationship with her...

tag_professor: Participation matters (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Hilarious (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: She\'s awesome. Hard to understand and class could get extremely boring, but she really cares about the students and she is helpful. There will be quizzes occasionally, but she will alert you and they are only 2 questions long. Get to use cheat sheet on the tests and the final was optional.

tag_professor: Participation matters (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Hilarious (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Take attendance. There is a quiz every week, but you can use your notes during the quiz. You can also use cheating sheet in the exams.

tag_professor: Participation matters (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Hilarious (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: You could not ask for more from a professor. She gave us huge index cards to write on and use for all of the exams, an extra credit assignment, candy and snacks, and made the final exam optional because she knew we had more important finals to worry about. She also truly cared about all of her students and made sure everyone would succeed. <3 her

tag_professor: Participation matters (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Hilarious (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Really nice and helpful professor. Allows cheat sheet on exams and quizzes.. shows that she truly wants her students to do well. If you do your work and put some effort into the class, you\'ll be fine. The only downside is that the class can be a little dry and her accent is a little difficult to understand at first. But highly recommend her!

tag_professor: Participation matters (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Hilarious (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: She is a great professor. Very helpful, always willing to set aside time to help. She loves teaching the class and takes students ideas of improvement seriously, so she can teach the best way possible. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!

tag_professor: Participation matters (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Hilarious (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: She is an awesome teacher and her class is really easy because of it. Allows a cheat sheet on tests and even has her own notes that you just fill in. Take this teacher!

tag_professor: Participation matters (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Hilarious (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Ms. Liang is a very nice professor who may not always command her lectures as she is foreign and her accent isn\'t always understood, but, once you grow accustomed to the accent, she\'s really awesome. If you study, you\'ll succeed. She gives you ALL help and materials required to do good. Plus, you can use an index card on midterm and final exams!
